description: The ancient city where Jesus performed his first miracle
historicalDetails: Cana was a village in Galilee where, according to the Gospel of John, Jesus performed his first miracle, turning water into wine at a wedding feast. The exact location is debated among scholars, with several possible sites identified in modern-day Israel.

mediaItems.altText: Archaeological remains at the traditional site of Cana
mediaItems.title: Cana Archaeological Site

title: Cana of Galilee
